result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

3:46 PM Defendant Cory H Wayman in court, in custody with the Vilas County Jail.  Attorney Daniel Francis Snyder appeared by video for Cory H Wayman.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. State/Defense speak to the case. Defense requesting one more judicial pre-trial. Bond continued.
Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 02:45 pm.

3:18 PM Defendant Cory H Wayman in court, in custody.  Attorney Daniel Francis Snyder in court for Cory H Wayman.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Waiver of preliminary hearing.  Rights given.  Court finds defendant is making a knowing and voluntary waiver of right to preliminary examination.  Court finds probable cause.  Bound over for arraignment on an information.  State to e-file information in court and provides copies to defense.  Defense waives formal reading of information.  Not guilty pleas entered by court.  Bond continued.
Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
Judicial Pretrial - in court on October 10, 2022 at 03:45 pm.

11:15 AM Defendant Cory H Wayman in court, in custody.  Attorney Daniel Francis Snyder appeared by video for Cory H Wayman.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense acknowledge complaint. Waives reading. Waive the time limit to facilitate scheduling. Not guilty plea entered. Bond continued.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

11:28 AM Defendant Cory H Wayman in court, in custody without counsel from the Vilas County Jail.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Eligible for Public Defender and still looking for representation. Defendant makes request for bail modification. State objects to the modification.  Court denies the motion to modify bond.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 10:45 am.
